Prevent file deletion on Linux

Note to self, before I google it another 25 times … Here’s how to prevent a file to be deleted using extended attributes on Linux:

    chattr +i <file>

to check if it worked:

    lsattr <file>

example:

    $> sudo chattr +i testfile
    $> lsattr testfile
    ----i------------e- testfile
